content:
**Hi, I am Carl-Wolfram. Welcome to my homepage!** --  I am a Postdoctoral Researcher at the Centre for Central Banking at the Frankfurt School of Finance and Management. I obtained my Ph.D. in Economics at the European University Institute (EUI) in 2024. I have previously worked as a trainee in the Monetary Policy Outlook Division of the Bank of England and as a trainee and research analyst in the Research Division of the European Central Bank.
 Download CV   --
